attachments.title: THE FUNKSHUN | MIXED BY K-$ADILLA & CURATED BY BLR & K-$ADILLA (4/13/17) by THUNDERSTONE RADIO
attachments.text:
It's groovy, it's funky, it's an all around future funk sensation, folks: it's THE FUNKSHUN! Get ready for these future funk-esque bangers dammit. These the type of jawns that you slap around ya old head and they fuck around and grab that Henny for the one time and hit the two-step ya feel me. So, per usual, drop that nut ass Spotify or Apple music, and get shit jiggy with another episode of Thunderstone Radio. 

Tracklist:
1. Love Me - M1S (LOSANGELES)
2. Rawtational - Casual Connection
3. Some Mistakes - Anna Wise
4. Ring Ring - Lola Disco & Cero Rio
5. Lonely People - Lebron
6. Aura Loop - Amhrest
7. Party Time - Stereo Plastic
8. My Delight - Gavin Turek
9. The Only One - Fibre & Discandy
10. Veil - Matsunoki
11. Bikini - Ninetynine
12. Dreams - Bukun!
13. Say To Me - Monamie
14. Back To Love - Wasted Nights
15. Let The Music Take Control - Android Apartment
16. Remember - Ev.Exi
17. Uncontrollable - Ichiban
18. Without Your Love - Escape
19. Takes A Little - Cute Wink
